Sentence.string: I found one of your cigar in Marcus’ dressing room.
Yes. It’s true, we used to discuss before the show. We mainly talked about this and that.
From what technicians said, your discussion was more an argument rather than a simple discussion between two old friends.
We can’t hide anything from you, can we? We had a big argument, it’s true.
I tried for the umpteenth time to reason with him concerning his star whims. He really treated the technical people like dirt.
Did you leave each other on good terms ?
He just asked me to leave, which I did. Further to which I went to eat a bit alone before the show began.
